mapper.select: SELECT count(*) AS countuserId FROM USER_PROFILE_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_PROFILE_INFO ( PROFILE_ID, USER_ID, NAME, PHONE, BIRTH, GENDER, ADDRESS, PART_TIME_EXPERIENCE, SYSTEM_REGISTER_ID, SYSTEM_UPDATER_ID ) VALUES ( #{profileId}, #{userId}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{address}, #{partTimeExperience}, #{userId}, #{userId} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE NAME = #{name}, PHONE = #{phone}, BIRTH = #{birth}, GENDER = #{gender}, ADDRESS = #{address}, PART_TIME_EXPERIENCE = #{partTimeExperience}, SYSTEM_UPDATER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT ui.email, ui.user_type_code, up.NAME, up.PHONE, up.BIRTH, up.GENDER, up.ADDRESS, up.PART_TIME_EXPERIENCE FROM user_info ui INNER JOIN USER_PROFILE_INFO up ON ui.user_id = up.USER_ID WHERE ui.user_id = #{userId}
